name: K-Means
desc: Pixel clustering based on RGB distance from K centers.
category: Computer Vision and Machine Learning Projects

name: Mean Shift
desc: Image segmentation based on RGB histogram peak climbing.
category: Computer Vision and Machine Learning Projects

name: Split & Merge Segmentation
desc: Region based image segmentation based on merging homogeneous regions and splitting of heterogeneous regions.
category: Computer Vision and Machine Learning Projects

name: Balanced Histogram Thresholding
desc: Image binarization threshold automatically selected with histogram medians.
category: Computer Vision and Machine Learning Projects

name: Image Kernels
desc: General implementation of image kernels for any convolution matrix.
category: Computer Vision and Machine Learning Projects

name: Perceptron Machine Learning
desc: Linear pixel color classification based on <R, G, B> vectors.
category: Computer Vision and Machine Learning Projects

name: Keras Activation Methods
desc: Tested various activation methods on mnist fashion dataset to see which had the best accuracy.
category: Computer Vision and Machine Learning Projects

name: Quantifying Skill in Lincoln-Douglas Debate
desc: Research and evaluation of ranking systems such as Elo and Glicko-2.

name: Statistical Analysis of the Impact of the Transition to Online Tournaments in LD Debate
desc: Determine affect of online debate on participation, speaker points, and side bias.

name: Statistical Analysis of Side-Bias in High School Lincoln-Douglas Debate Article Series
desc: Web scraper to pull 40k+ round data points to determine bias. Results now cited as evidence in national debate rounds.

name: Lincoln Douglas Debate Slack App
desc: Slack integration to scrape common debate websites and to retrive database stored arguments.

name: Custom Vision for FTC, 2019 FIRST Championship Robotics Conference
desc: Presented research on custom vision and machine learning for FTC teams. Discussed classical image processing, optimization methods, and deep learning approaches. Invited back for the 2020 World Championship.

name: Lunar Knights Robotics Team Control Systems Lead
desc: Compete in NASA Robotic Mining Competition. Lead design discussions and teach control system workshops. Wrote custom C++ and python libraries for control systems.

name: FIRST Robotics FTC Team Control Systems Lead
desc: Competed in FIRST Tech Challenge (2015 - 2019). Inspire Award Winner (2018 World Championship) - top overall team. Robot Semifinalist (2017 World Championship). Specialized in custom vision and machine learning algorithms.

name: Sorting Methods
desc: Graphical demonstration of common sorting algorithms.

name: Assorted Projects
desc: Ongoing repository to solidfy programming concepts. Projects included: interpreter for custom language syntax, steganography, and fractals.
